text:
You're quite early today.
The rest of Houkura haven't arrived yet.

Yes...
I arrived a little early...

The other day...I received...
a good quality... yokan from my hometown...

I'd like everyone...
to have a taste as well...

So, I'm preparing tea...
for that reason...

...Oh, you're pouring
hot water into teacups instead of a teapot.
But by pouring boiling water into the teacups once...

It creates... the perfect temperature...
for brewing sencha...

I'd like... everyone...
to enjoy... delicious tea...

Hehe... No, not really...
Rinze isn't... anything special...

If... Houkura were...
in Rinze's position...

They would probably...
do the same as Rinze...

Even though their ages...
and personalities are different...

They trust each other...
and can connect without barriers...

...Ah
I'm sure the others feel the same way about you.

Hm?
Rinze, isn't there one extra teacup?

...?
There are six cups...Is that not correct...?
But, you prepared it for the rest of Houkura, right?

Producer-sama...
Would you have preferred... coffee instead...?

...Oh.
You prepared one for me too?

Yes...
I thought you might like to...
have some...

Haha, thank you.
Since you've gone to the trouble, I'll have some tea too.
